TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DistributedContextPropagator.PropagatorSetterCallback(object? carrier, string fieldName, string fieldValue);
.class nested public auto ansi sealed DistributedContextPropagator/PropagatorSetterCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DistributedContextPropagator.PropagatorSetterCallback(carrier As Object, fieldName As String, fieldValue As String)
type DistributedContextPropagator.PropagatorSetterCallback = delegate of obj * string * string -> unit
public: delegate void DistributedContextPropagator::PropagatorSetterCallback(System::Object ^ carrier, System::String ^ fieldName, System::String ^ fieldValue);

Docs.param: The medium used by propagators to write values to.
Docs.summary: Represents the callback method that's used in propagators' inject methods. This callback is invoked to set the value of a named field. Propagators may invoke it multiple times in order to set multiple fields.
